member.name: IDxcCompiler2.CompileWithDebug
member.summary: Compile a single entry point to the target shader model with debug information. IDxcCompiler.CompileWithDebug is deprecated; use instead.
member.param: An optional file name for pSource. Used in errors and include handlers.
An array of pointers to arguments.
An optional user-provided interface to handle #include directives.
The compiler output status, buffer, and errors.
A suggested file name for the debug blob. You must free this memory by using .
